actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study of the feasibility of extending navigation upstream on the Sabine River from the vicinity of Orange to Longview, Texas.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to study the feasibility of extending shallow-draft navigation on the Sabina River Channel project in Texas.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study of the feasibility of extending navigation upstream on the Sabine River from the vicinity of Orange to Longview, Texas.
